attributes.action: Listen to the British public and give us a referendum on whether we reject EEC membership. No more false promises then denials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are steadily being devoured by a European Republic which is damaging our way of life. This government has no intention of listening to the people who employ them.We have a right to decide whether we want to continue financing the unelected dictators in Brussels before we are a bankrupt country. Control over our borders is essential and a repeal of the dodgy Human rights law would seem to be a non starter if we remain within Europe. When are we British going to stand up and be counted?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
